tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Volunteer_information (
    volunteer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    volunteer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    hours_served INT
)

CREATE TABLE volunteers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR,
  phone_number VARCHAR,
  address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE volunteer_rewards (
  reward_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  volunteer_id UUID,
  reward_name VARCHAR,
  reward_description VARCHAR,
  reward_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE volunteers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE hours (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    volunteer_id INT,
    date DATE,
    hours_served INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES volunteers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE volunteer_rewards (
    volunteer_id INT,
    reward_id INT,
    date_awarded DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES volunteers(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reward_id) REFERENCES rewards(id)
);

CREATE TABLE VolunteerEvents (
    volunteer_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    hours_worked INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES Volunteers(volunteer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VolunteerRewards (
    volunteer_id INT,
    reward_id INT,
    date_received DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES Volunteers(volunteer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reward_id) REFERENCES Rewards(reward_id)
);
